document_data.name: Leda Widris
document_data.mainbody: '''Leda Widris''' was a mercenary just before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.Personality: Leda was an honest and courageous woman. She wanted to experience what a real cold wind felt like.
document_data.History: Leda worked for many years as a mercenary in [[south Faerun]]. At the start of the Tyranny of Dragons inÂ [[1489 DR]] in exchange for passage to [[north Faerun]], Leda acted as a guard for a great caravan, which unknown to her was full of [[Cult of the Dragon]] agents transporting treasures for the [[Hoard of the Dragon Queen]].
